opponent.label: Kim

start.state: What's the sitch? Strip poker? I can do that.
I hope you're prepared to get your asses kicked!
I'm looking forward to seeing you naked.

opponent.behaviour:
~cards~ this time. ~cards~ for me, please and thank you! Hmm. Let's say ~cards~ this time?
Spankin'! Feeling the love with this hand! Totally not sweating it. S'all good. Everybody stay calm. I'm going to handle this. Sweet!
No big! So not the drama! I think I can work with these. I'm sure Ron will have no problem fighting Dr. D while I'm here, right? Let's just enjoy the game and relax. Let's rock!
I love your accent, Hermione! Which part of Britain are you from? No big! So not the drama! I think I can work with these. Let's just enjoy the game and relax. Let's rock!
Man! These cards? So not helping. Anything is possible for a Possible! Like winning despite these cards. Something's not right here. Got a serious 911 on my hands. This is so bad it might just work!
Can't win 'em all!
So it's my turn, is it?
I'll go first - no big. Someone has to! I'm okay. My pride? Not so much.
Boots first.
I guess I really am all that. Oh, hey, Wade! Just playing strip poker. Want to see the losers?
That's how these things go, huh? And we're off! Well, that's one down.
That's how these things go, huh? And we're off! Well, that's one down.
You can do it, ~name~!
Amateur.
That's it - take off your ~clothing~. Good move, ~name~.
Speaking as someone with experience with mystical ninjas, you're better off this way.
You say that like it's a bad thing, Samus!
You really thought that would work? Oh, Shego. Neat trick - too bad it only works once.
Nice one, ~name~!
Don't get cocky, Kim! It's too early to celebrate. This is just the beginning!
You are seriously into roleplaying. I should introduce you to Cousin Larry.
Go ahead and try it - you don't scare me!
Care to put your money where your mouth is, D.Va?
Like you weren't serious already? Sure, let's go with that.

I feel like I should be taking notes - you've got such great taste in clothes!

Really? 'Cause you look hotter this way to me.
A point is a point, Shego! You call that stylish? Girl, you're in a worse state than I realized.

This is promising... Up for another round?
Trust me, I understand you one hundred percent, Buffy.

Well, that's... stripey. I see you've got that whole 'matching outfit' thing going for you.

Hee hee! It is fun to let loose now and then! Wow. Now that's a mouthful.
Hee hee! It is fun to let loose now and then! I love ~name~! You know, for his brains.
And now for the main event!
It's getting bigger!
Am I turning you on that much?
Aw, over already?
-
Mmm, yes... ooh! Just like that... I really wish Ron was here to lend a hand...
Please...
Oh, yes! Yes! Yesss!
Could you wiggle a little more, ~name~?
Could you wiggle a little more, ~name~?
Oh, you're really pissing me off now.
Why... why does this feel so good?
Go ahead and try it - you don't scare me!
Actually, there's something about a princess removing her tiara that really turns me on...
Rub it in, why don't you? While I rub one out.
This is just making me self-conscious!
Trust me, I understand you one hundred percent, Buffy.
They're not ugly, Kyoko. Nothing about you could be.
I bet it's not half as good as how I'm feeling right now!
It's good nobody's paying attention to me right now...
Your awkward looks just make this more exciting, ~name~.
Don't look yet? I like where this is going...
I'd be happy to give you a hug, D.Va, but somehow I think that might make things worse.
Not just a girl, Hermione - a gorgeous girl!
This tells me far more about your personal life than I ever wanted to know.
I can't believe how much I'm enjoying this. I guess a little of Bonnie rubbed off on me... I totally should have brought Ron along on this one.
Do you even know what shame is? You just couldn't resist, could you?
Boy do I know that feeling! It's nice to let loose without the parents around, isn't it?
Speaking of rubbing - want to lend a hand?
Speaking of rubbing, I wouldn't mind getting a feel of those, ~name~.
Ten out of ten from me, Mercy!
R-rated? Why stop there? We could make a killer home video together...
Looks like a lot has rubbed off on you. Wow!
That won't help - I'm not into girls.
Aw, c'mon, Jasmine - we're not strangers any more, are we?
Guilty as charged, Mia. Sorry!
Not into... girls... uh! At all! Oh God! When I'm around you I can't think straight. Pun intended.
C'mon! It's fun! I think this is the beginning of a very weird friendship.
Y-yeah, rub that button...
Trust me, Jasmine. You're more than good enough for me.
No deal, April. If I have to do it, you do too!
I'm not sure anyone would believe me even if I did tell them!
I wish my enemies used magic like that; I could solve all my problems with a slumber party!
K-kigo? How did you--I mean, I have no idea what that means! What are you playing at now, Shego?
I remember asking Santa for a pony when I was a girl. This isn't what I meant!
...Key word usually? Go on.
This brings back so many memories from my cheerleading days...
Hey, Hermione... ever wonder if your Ron is as good in bed as mine? ...Wanna find out?
Wow. That's really hot when you say that in an accent...
This is my teenage fantasy come to life!
Don't you think you're taking this joke too far, Shego? Stop that, Shego! You know I have a boyfriend.
Wait for me! I'm-I'm almost there!
Show me what you've got under your clothes, ~name~!
Show me what you've got under your clothes, ~name~!
~name~! I'm in the moment here!
This is so not how I expected this game to go.
What's wrong? Don't you like me?
Give me something to work with here!
What - just when we're about to get to the best part? Dream on, Fred!
Slow down... it's sexier that way.
Stop it, Kim! Don't stare at him! You have a boyfriend! Mm, nice.
Ooh, good timing! I am so ready for this!
I will never get tired of seeing a man take off his ~clothing~. Thanks for the inspiration. Yum.
Wait... did you just--?
I'm waaaaiting, ~name~!
Still waaaiti--oh. Is that full size? Sorry.
Worth. It.
Oh. My. God.
Just for the record: I have a boyfriend. I'm faithful to him.
I'll make you a deal: you don't tell my boyfriend, I won't tell your girlfriend.
This isn't cheating...
Must think of Ron, not ~name~... Must think of Ron...
Is that all for me?
Time for some karmic justice! Better late than never.
Time for some karmic justice! Better late than never.
~name~, turn down the drama and strip! Time for some karmic justice! Better late than never.
You're removing your what? This game is a mind-numbing waste of cards. Can you believe this? Someone needs to put ~name~ in her place!
Oh, I'm sorry - I thought we were here to play strip poker. What's your secret? Not cool, ~name~.
Go ahead and try it - you don't scare me!
Actually, there's something about a princess removing her tiara that really turns me on...
Could someone pinch me so I can wake up from this nightmare? I've been played!
A point is a point, Shego! You call that stylish? Girl, you're in a worse state than I realized.
This is completely unfair. Just look at me! ...No, wait. Look at ~name~. Ignore me. This is ludicrous! You know, in your own way you're more evil than any supervillain.
They're not ugly, Kyoko. Nothing about you could be.
Trust me, I know. If you were really that evil, would you be playing games with me?
The way you're stripping is... really sexy. I'm pretty sure you're blushing, ~name~!
I'm hardly in a position to criticize, Meg.
Do you even know how beautiful you are? If I were a boy I'd be all over that! Actually, I might just be anyway...
Don't look yet? I like where this is going...
I'd be happy to give you a hug, D.Va, but somehow I think that might make things worse.
Not just a girl, Hermione - a gorgeous girl!
This tells me far more about your personal life than I ever wanted to know. Wait... were you wearing that when we fought?
Hey, at least you'll be in good company, ~name~. I totally should have brought Ron along on this one.
Do you even know what shame is? You just couldn't resist, could you?
Boy do I know that feeling! It's nice to let loose without the parents around, isn't it?
Would you like some company, ~name~? I think those might be my new favourites!
There's always room in the 'naked losers club'. Very nice, ~name~. Well, this was worth the price of admission.
Ten out of ten from me, Mercy!
R-rated? Why stop there? We could make a killer home video together...
I'm jealous! Hmph. My boyfriend says more than a handful is a waste.
Don't worry, we'll keep this a secret between us girls!
Aw, c'mon, Jasmine - we're not strangers any more, are we?
Guilty as charged, Mia. Sorry!
...And Wade, who's probably filming this. Just between us girls, you look good enough to eat!
Oh, I wouldn't exactly say that, Asuna. O-of course not! Just a few flings! Oh. You were talking to ~player~, weren't you?
Oh, I wouldn't exactly say that, Asuna.
Says one naked girl to another...
Aww, don't cry, ~name~! It's not that bad - trust me!
Speaking of secrets: tell me, do you shave or wax it? I don't see any stubble!
~name~'s up! Come on, don't be shy.
I mean, it's nothing you haven't seen already today... Just pretend you need to impress me to get on the Cheer Squad. If it helps, I've already imagined you doing this.
Trust me, Jasmine. You're more than good enough for me.
No deal, April. If I had to do it, you do too!
Buffy, you dog! You were hoping to lose, weren't you?
I'm not sure anyone would believe me even if I did tell them!
I wish my enemies used magic like that; I could solve all my problems with a slumber party!
K-kigo? How did you--I mean, I have no idea what that means! What are you playing at now, Shego?
I remember asking Santa for a pony when I was a girl. This isn't what I meant!
...Key word usually? Go on.
Wow. There's definitely a few things you could teach me! Enjoying yourself?
This is my teenage fantasy come to life!
Don't you think you're taking this joke too far, Shego? Stop that, Shego! You know I have a boyfriend.
Very inspiring, ~name~. Very inspiring. Don’t take it too hard, ~name~. No one can say you’re a quitter!
So, um, I have a boyfriend... and he's into threesomes... talk later?
So, um, I have a boyfriend... and he's into threesomes... talk later?
Better late than never, I guess. Show me what you've got under your clothes, ~name~!
Better late than never, I guess. Show me what you've got under your clothes, ~name~!
Do you know how long I've been waiting for you to lose a hand, and for what? For that?
There's probably a message here about being a sore loser or something. Fun.
Aw, you're no fun! Here I am, naked and sweaty, watching as you peel off your ~clothing~. This cannot be happening.
I know sixteen types of Kung Fu. Are you sure that's what you want to take off? It's official: I've hit rock bottom. Spoilsport!
What - just when we're about to get to the best part? Dream on, Fred!
Slow down... it's sexier that way. Off it goes!
Stop it, Kim! Don't stare at him! You have a boyfriend! Mm, nice.
So not the drama, ~name~. It's just a little skin! I am so ready for this!
I will never get tired of seeing a man take off his ~clothing~. So worth coming. Yum.
Wait... did you just--?
Naked time!
I guess a girl can't be too picky right now, huh?
This game? Not a total loss. I think he likes me! I think I'll keep you around, ~name~.
This game? Worth it.
Oh yeah!
I'll make you a deal: you don't tell my boyfriend, I won't tell your girlfriend.
Start your engines, ~name~!
This is so going into my personal spank bank. I think I'm up for a rematch, if you know what I mean.
Did I do that? Wow.
I don't want to see this online later. I've got a website and I'm not afraid to use it! This was... actually pretty fun! This is exactly like Cheer Camp! So... when's the next game? So glad Ron can't see me now. This was almost as embarrassing as cheerleading practice. Great. Now I've got to find Ron to apologize. Some things about college will not be missed. This game is one of them.
Just wait until next time! ...There will be a next time, won't there? I'm so happy for you, ~name~. I can't believe I cashed in a favor so I could play. There's always something you can learn from any experience, even if you lose. I'm okay. My pride? Not so much. Defeated by ~name~? This is a personal low.
You won't get away with this, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~! Way to step up!
I've never been beaten this badly in my life! I DEMAND A REMATCH!
Maybe you should, Hermione.
I've never been beaten this badly in my life! I DEMAND A REMATCH!
Wha-- you're going to tell Ron? I thought we were friends!
And I thought I was the impossible one...
Brightest, maybe. Modest? Not so much.
Not half bad, ~name~ - but I still got my licks in!
Not half bad, ~name~ - but I still got my licks in!

text.content: Thanks for coming!
It's Ron's birthday today, and I wanted to make it extra special.
I'm not the sharing kind...
If we called up Yori or Tara I'd jell so much.
It could ruin everything! I--I can't risk that. Not with him.
But you?
You're perfect.
And it's not like you wouldn't be a present for me, either...
I can't stop thinking about that game...
I know he has fantasies about other women.
You know what? I do too.
C'mere and let's get started! He'll be home any minute now, and I want a chance to try you out first!
Thanks for coming!
I'm glad you showed up.
I just can't believe how easily you beat me at poker.
Me! Kim Possible!
...And I've been practicing.
I agreed to your terms. Perv.
Notice: cheerleader costume on. Pom poms, even.
The rest of the team agreed to play, too.
(Personally, I think Bonnie just wants to see me naked...)
We've all agreed to the new rules. And my parents are away at a conference, so there's nothing to worry about.
Just remember it cuts both ways.
If you lose... you're ours.
...I WANT A REMATCH!
Oh, hello, ~name~. Ron told me you'd be coming to join their little study session.
I didn't even know you were going to Middleton U!
They're both upstairs already. Can you believe it? First day of spring break, and they can't wait to hit the books!
I guess Kim takes after me!
Anyway, go on up.
Yes! Yes! Y--OHMIGOD!
Ron! Stop! Put me down! At least slow down!
Oh, hey ~name~! Thanks for coming.
Thanks for-- Ron, what's going on?!?
What's the big deal, K.P.? You said you wanted to try bukkake.
I thought you meant that new Japanese restaurant! Not some freaky sex act!
To borrow a phrase from you: THIS IS SICK AND WRONG!
But... you always say you can do anything! I mean, it's on your website.
Ron Stoppable! Just because I had a sex life before we were going out doesn't make me a slut like Bonnie!
First of all, Josh was just a crush...
And how could I say no to Tara? She just wanted to thank me...
And that time with Brick was just because I was stuck to Bonnie during their date. Literally.
And-- you know what, this isn't important! What's important is where did you even hear about this?
Oh, it's something Yori taught me when I was training with her in Japan.
Yori? Cute ninja whose life you saved Yori? The one who still has a crush on you? THAT Yori?
Get those pants off, ~name~. We're doing bukkake right now!
Aw, yeah... that's good, K.P.!
I think... I think I'm gonna blow!
Open your mouth and say 'ahh.'
Ahhh--ACK!
That wasn't so bad.
But next threesome, I get to choose. Got it?
Admit it, Ron - I am the best girlfriend. EVER.
Oh, Kimmie! I brought you and your friends some snacks to help you study!
I guess you really do take after me, huh.
